thread.title: Someone Broke Into Nicki Minaj's Home Stole $175,000 Worth of Property
thread.title_full: Someone Broke Into Nicki Minaj's Home and Stole $175,000 Worth of Property

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Someone Broke Into Nicki Minaj's Home Stole $175,000 Worth of Property
text:
While Nicki Minaj was off making peace and possibly recording music with Drake and Lil Wayne, multiple sources report her Los Angeles mansion was ransacked and robbed of approximately $175,000 worth of jewelry and other stolen property. TMZ reports that Nicki's house was "totally trashed" while the rapper was out of town sometime between November and January, and that the suspect or suspects flipped over furniture and knocked over multiple items throughout the house as though looking for something in particular. Sources close to the case also told TMZ that the damage looked "personal," and that the burglars had "destroyed picture frames, perfume bottles, [and] furniture," and had also cut up some of Nicki's clothing.
 According to E! News , police have not yet named any suspects in the case and the investigation is still ongoing. Since Nicki's home is reportedly "equipped with security systems and closed circuit cameras," police are hoping to find video footage of the burglary in order to help with their investigation.
At this time, Nicki has not released a statement on the matter.
From: Cosmopolitan
